homePage.subHeader2: kubyerekeye umwana wawe, ishuri ryanyu cyangwa ishuri ryanyu.

login.invalidUsername: Niba ishuri ryanyu ridakoresha Zeraki Analytics, twandikire kuri +254798 666 000 cyangwa info@zeraki.co.ke turakugarukira vuba. Urashobora kandi guhitamo kwinjira niba usanzwe ufite konti.

register.info1: Niba ishuri ryanyu ridakoresha Zeraki Analytics, twandikire kuri
register.info5: kandi tuzakugarukira vuba. Urashobora kandi guhitamo

features.heading: Impamvu Ukwiye Guhitamo
features.content1: Sisitemu yihuse kandi yoroshye kuboneka ishobora gukoreshwa mugenda
features.content2: Isesengura ryimbitse rizi neza icyo urimo gushaka
features.content3: Biroroshye gushiraho no gukoresha nta bumenyi bwibanze bwa tekinoroji isabwa
features.content5: Kuzenguruka isaha kugirango ubone itsinda ryinzobere zunganira abakiriya
features.content6: Byakiriwe kuri seriveri ya seriveri yemeza ko nta gutakaza amakuru

testimonial.sub_header: Abakiriya bacu baradukunda! Soma ibyo bavuga hepfo
testimonial.content1: Imwe mumpamvu nyamukuru twahinduye kuri Zeraki nuburyo byoroshye gukoresha, kandi niyo waba ugumye, itsinda ryabo ryita kubakiriya rizagusubiza muminota mike
testimonial.content2: Isesengura rya Zeraki rirakenewe cyane mubyumba by'ejo. Nigikoresho cyagaciro rwose mumaboko ya mwarimu kubisesengura byombi
testimonial.content3: Zeraki yamfashije rwose gutakaza umwanya munini- Nshobora gusesengura ibizamini byanjye, kohereza inyandiko kubabyeyi kandi nkandika amanota yose kurubuga rumwe, Urakoze Zeraki kubicuruzwa byawe byiza

about.content: Zeraki byose ni ugukoresha ikoranabuhanga kugirango ukemure ibibazo bimwe na bimwe bigoye guhura nabyo mugutanga uburezi bufite ireme muri Afrika. Ibisubizo byacu byambere, bitanga ubushishozi butuma ibyemezo bifatwa neza, bigatanga uburyo bwiza bwo kwigisha no gukuramo imihangayiko mubikorwa bya buri munsi byubuyobozi. Duharanira kuzamura imibereho yabarezi nabanyeshuri kuri buri cyiciro no mubihe byose. Ibicuruzwa byacu byibanze, isesengura rya Zeraki, rihindura uburyo amakuru yuburezi akusanywa, asesengurwa kandi akoreshwa

footer.text: Zeraki byose ni ugukoresha ikoranabuhanga kugirango ukemure ibibazo bimwe na bimwe bigoye guhura nabyo mugutanga uburezi bufite ireme muri Afrika
footer.text2: Ibisubizo byacu byambere, bitanga ubushishozi butuma ibyemezo bifatwa neza, bigatanga uburyo bwiza bwo kwigisha no gukuramo imihangayiko mubikorwa bya buri munsi byubuyobozi

purchases.info: Kugura inguzanyo ya SMS ukoresheje MPESA, koresha ibisobanuro bikurikira:
purchases.noteText2: 2) Menya neza ko nimero ya konte ugaragaza muri MPESA ari nkuko bigaragara hejuru ni ukuvuga SMS{{smsCode}}. Niba wirengagije ibaruwa iyo ari yo yose cyangwa umubare, ubwishyu buzangwa
purchases.noteText3: 3) Numara kwishyura, Safaricom irakumenyesha ko ubwishyu bwakozwe kuri {{paybillName}}
purchases.charges: Amafaranga ya SMS ni Ksh. 1 / - kuri SMS

compose.info1: Herekanwa hepfo nicyitegererezo cyubutumwa buzoherezwa kubabyeyi. Kwinjira muburyo burambuye byerekanwe nibisobanuro birambuye, kandi ubutumwa nyirizina buzaba burimo ibyangombwa nyabyo kuri buri munyeshuri
compose.info2: Mubyeyi mwiza, twafatanije na Zeraki gutanga ibikoresho byo kwigira kubanyeshuri bacu kugirango tubemere gukomeza kwigira murugo.
compose.info3: Kugirango ubone ibikoresho, nyamuneka kanda ahanditse hanyuma ukuremo Zeraki Kwiga mububiko bukinirwaho: https://bit.ly/ZerakiKwiga
compose.info5: Mugihe hari ibibazo, hamagara Zeraki kuri 0790 493 495
compose.subject: Ingingo
compose.senderIDError: (Izina ryishuri rizongerwaho kurangiza buri butumwa kuko ishuri ridafite indangamuntu yihariye)

keyWordsList.competencyDesc: Muri rusange ubushobozi buteganijwe bwumunyeshuri kurangiza ingingo, ijambo cyangwa umwaka, nyuma yo guhura numubiri wubumenyi, ubuhanga nindangagaciro
keyWordsList.descriptorDesc: Itanga ibisobanuro birambuye ku buryo uwishingikirije yageze ku musaruro uteganijwe wo kwiga mu ngingo runaka
keyWordsList.genericSkillsDesc: Izi nizindi gahunda zishobora kwimurwa ubuhanga bworoshye bukoreshwa kubintu byose kandi bikunze gushakishwa mu kinyejana cya 21 nisi yakazi
keyWordsList.identifierDesc: Nibirango / amanota atandukanya abiga ukurikije imyigire yabo yo kugera kubushobozi bwashyizweho
keyWordsList.scoreDesc: Yerekeza ku kigereranyo cyamanota yagezweho kubisubizo bitandukanye byo kwiga bigize ubushobozi
keyWordsList.score1: Bake Los yabigezeho, ariko ntibihagije kubyo bagezeho muri rusange
keyWordsList.score2: LOs nyinshi zagezweho, zihagije kubigeraho muri rusange
keyWordsList.score3: Byinshi cyangwa byose Los yagezeho kubyo yagezeho muri rusange

swal.text: Iki gikorwa gishobora gufata igihe. Nyamuneka ihangane.
swal.text3: Uzi neza ko ushaka gusiba uyu munyeshuri?
